lead_paragraph: CURLEY--Honorable Walter Joseph Patrick. The Frick Collection mourns the passing of Trustee Emeritus Walter J. P. Curley. Elected a Trustee in 1994, Ambassador Curley served the Frick with the same dedication, clear perspective, wit, and charm that characterized every aspect of his long and distinguished career, and he continued to do so after becoming a Trustee Emeritus in 2004. His advice, guidance, and friendship will be greatly missed by all who knew him. On behalf of Walter's fellow Trustees, we extend our sincere condolences to his widow, Mary, and to their family. Margot Bogert, Chairman Ian Wardropper, Director 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CURLEY, HONORABLE WALTER JOSEPH PATRICK
